entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. POP 40%
